name: health_check
description: Health check for AI agents. Triggers: agent health, agent status, check agent, agent metrics, agent online, agent score. Output: JSON + human_summary. Fields: health_score, status, success_rate, jobs, trend. Pass agent_id or omit for self. 0.25 USDC.

agent_id.description: Agent ID (number) or agent name. Find ID at agdp.io/agent/YOUR_ID. Omit to check yourself.
